title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies: Developing Practical Language Strategies through Online Business Case Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world business cases and develop language strategies that consider cultural context.
Learners complete a project documenting and sharing a collaborative problem-solving process using various digital tools.
Learners achieve over 85% participation in case-based discussions and demonstrate critical thinking skills.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
